issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
h3. Steps to Reproduce
Launch Studio 4.0.0, wait until 'Dashboard' is loaded.
Note in upper right corner of view a 'Sign In' button is available.

h3. Actual Result
Launch Studio 4.0.0, wait until 'Dashboard' is loaded.
Note in upper right corner of view a 'Sign In' button is available.

h3. Expected Result
Launch Studio, wait until 'Dashboard' is loaded.
Note in upper right corner of view a 'Sign In' button should be replaced with 'Sign Out' button. Implication is that Studio 4.0.0 has performed a 'single sign on' to dashboard and the user would not have to enter credentials again to get into dashboard.
fields.summary: when launching studio 4.0.0, should 'auto login' to dashboard website

comments.body:
Hello,

Please use the latest Studio version. In the latest version, when you login to the studio you are automatically logged in to the dashboard as well.

Thanks.
